BOOLEAN RamFileSystem::AssignDriveLetter (  UINT8  drive_letter  ) 
 

Assigns a drive letter to the Returns a RamHandle to a node with the specified path name and attributes.

Parameters:
drive_letter Drive letter to be assigned.
Returns:
Whether the operation was successful or not.

BOOLEAN RamFileSystem::DeleteNode (  const Pathname &  pathname,
UINT16  attributes
) 
 

Deletes a node with the specified path name and attributes.

Parameters:
pathname Path name which defines a node.
attributes Attributes of the node. Use RamFileAttrAll to find all nodes.
Returns:
Whether the node could be deleted or not.

RamHandle RamFileSystem::FindNode (  const Pathname &  pathname,
UINT16  attributes
) 
 

Returns a RamHandle to a node with the specified path name and attributes.

Parameters:
pathname Path name which defines a node.
attributes Attributes of the node. Use RamFileAttrAll to find all nodes.
Returns:
A RamHandle of the found node. 0 if nothing is found.

BOOLEAN RamFileSystem::FormatFileSystem (  UINT16  block_size = c_ram_storage_default_block_size  ) 
 

Formats the file system with the specified size.

Parameters:
block_size New block size of the file system. Default is c_ram_storage_default_block_size defined in RamTypes.hpp.
Returns:
Whether the operation was successful or not.

UINT32 RamFileSystem::GetSpaceSize (   )  const
 

Returns the total size of the file system.

Returns:
The size of the file system.

WString RamFileSystem::GetTree (  RamHandle  node,
UINT  level = 0
)  const
 

Returns a tree of a node as WString representation. Because this method calls itself recursively the default value for level is zero and is increased for sub nodes in every call.

Parameters:
node Any node which defines any sub tree of root (or even root).
level The level of the indentation. Default is zero.
Returns:
A WString representing the tree.

UINT32 RamFileSystem::GetUsedSpaceSize (   )  const
 

Returns the used size of the file system.

Returns:
The used size of the file system.

RamHandle RamFileSystem::InsertNode (  RamFileObj *  file_obj  ) 
 

Returns a RamHandle to a node which is defined by the specified RamFileObj and inserted into the file system.

Parameters:
file_obj A RamFileObj object which contains the data of the file which has to be inserted.
Returns:
A RamHandle of the found node. 0 if it could not be inserted.
